metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays if you pick the option to talk about your relationship in the Laezel InParty Dialog.

52.speaker: Lae'zel
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Dwarf player.

96.speaker: Lae'zel
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Dwarf player.

95.speaker: Lae'zel
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Dwarf player.

70.speaker: Player
70.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Dwarf player.

68.speaker: Lae'zel
68.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Dwarf player.

80.speaker: Lae'zel
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Dwarf player.

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Dwarf player.

18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Dwarf player.

37.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Short player.

34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Tall player.

0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Laezel kisses you without thinking and worrying about surroundings. Tall player.

46.speaker: Lae'zel
46.text: We've discussed this. If you value our bond, you will honour my limits.

90.speaker: Lae'zel
90.text: If it weren't apparent, it should be: I'm not keen on such outward displays of our flesh-bond.

82.speaker: Lae'zel
82.text: Let there be no doubt: I have marked you, as you have me. In time, we might brazenly bare our marks.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: You hunger for me, yes? Don't deny yourself.

76.text: Yes, I hunger for you. But I have my limits, and you will respect them.
76.context: NodeContext: Not too meanly, just firmly and with a trace of affection

61.speaker: Lae'zel
61.text: Yes, I hunger for you. But I have my limits, and you will respect them.
61.context: NodeContext: Not too meanly, just firmly and with a trace of affection

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Scowl and purse your lips. Show Lae'zel your discontent.
33.context: NodeContext: Not too meanly, just firmly and with a trace of affection

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: I won't be guilted into indulging your whims. I have my limits, and you will respect them.
5.context: NodeContext: Not too meanly, just firmly and with a trace of affection

78.text: I won't be guilted into indulging your whims. I have my limits, and you will respect them.
78.context: NodeContext: Not too meanly, just firmly and with a trace of affection

79.speaker: Lae'zel
79.text: I won't be guilted into indulging your whims. I have my limits, and you will respect them.
79.context: NodeContext: Not too meanly, just firmly and with a trace of affection

56.speaker: Player
56.text: I'd give my right arm and left foot to kiss you right now.

29.speaker: Lae'zel
29.text: But we will have our time. And when we do, I will make your heart and flesh burn as hotly as you've ever known.

31.speaker: Lae'zel
31.text: But you can rest your mind. I'm not one to indulge so publicly.

66.speaker: Lae'zel
66.text: Once your heart-machine is repaired, however, I intend to gorge on you in the privacy of my bunk.

55.speaker: Lae'zel
55.text: You are my today. And should fate will it, my tomorrow.

105.speaker: Lae'zel
105.text: You are the tastes of my tongue. You are the ground beneath me and the skies above.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: You are. And so we are.

92.speaker: Lae'zel
92.text: The one who gave significance to this trivial rock...

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.text: ...and the one who unblinded me to a terrible truth: I had built my life on an empty foundation.

48.speaker: Lae'zel
48.text: Orpheus is the road to my freedom. And you are the reason to march down it.

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: A pleasure more carnal than the smell of a fresh kill.

88.speaker: Lae'zel
88.text: One day, I will achieve ascension, and I will revel in the psalms sung in Vlaakith's court.

107.speaker: Lae'zel
107.text: Until then, you will be my ecstasy.

49.speaker: Lae'zel
49.text: You are zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.

60.speaker: Lae'zel
60.text: I had the audacity to invite a person of your talents to strike me. You had the courage to stand against me, unflinching.

15.speaker: Lae'zel
15.text: In so doing, you made yourself my possession and my obsession.

45.speaker: Lae'zel
45.text: You are zhak vo'n'ash duj. Source of my bruises.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: I want to break our bond. No more 'us'.
38.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Lae'zel is sad but strong.

73.speaker: Lae'zel
73.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Lae'zel is sad but strong.

8.speaker: Narrator
8.text: *Your tadpoles connect. You feel your hearts thump in unison, like drums keeping beat to a wardance.*
8.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Lae'zel is sad but strong.

75.speaker: Lae'zel
75.text: 'I am not yours, you are not mine.' Say the words.
75.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Lae'zel is sad but strong.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I am not yours, you are not mine.
4.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Lae'zel is sad but strong.

63.speaker: Lae'zel
63.context: NodeContext: Breakup path. Lae'zel is sad but strong.

85.speaker: Lae'zel
85.text: You were zhak vo'n'ash duj - source of my bruises. The wounds you inflicted will heal. But they will leave behind scars.
85.context:
NodeContext: JHAK Voh-nahsh DOO

Breakup path. Lae'zel is sad but strong.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: I can't. I want to stay together.
6.context: NodeContext: Tired of repeating this little love game in dialogue, but only slightly.

71.speaker: Lae'zel
71.context: NodeContext: Tired of repeating this little love game in dialogue, but only slightly.

47.speaker: Lae'zel
47.context: NodeContext: Relieved, glad to hear the player doesn't want to break up.

72.speaker: Lae'zel
72.text: But can we end this little game? It's not as amusing for me as it apparently is for you.

41.speaker: Lae'zel
41.context: NodeContext: Relieved, glad to hear the player doesn't want to break up.

51.speaker: Lae'zel
51.text: Good. Then we needn't speak of this again.
51.context: NodeContext: Relieved, glad to hear the player doesn't want to break up.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: My bruises still sting from our battle.

93.speaker: Lae'zel
93.text: The pain is a mutual promise branded on our flesh and bone.

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.text: Inside your every wound lives my obsession. Inside my every wound lives your passion.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: I'd like to change the subject.
